Liga 1: Kata Edson Tavares Setelah Persija Ditahan Semen Padang
07 Nov 2019, 13:25 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Pelatih Persija Jakarta Edson Tavares menyatakan poin yang diraih saat menahan imbang Semen Padang 2-2 dalam lanjutan Liga 1 di Stadion Haji Agus Salim, Kota Padang, sangat penting untuk perjalanan tim.
“Di awal babak kita bermain kurang baik, namun di babak kedua kita berkembang menjadi lebih baik dan bola tersalurkan dengan baik,” kata pelatih asal Brasil itu selepas laga.
Ia mengatakan hasil ini positif bagi timnya dan modal penting menyongsong laga yang akan digelar di kandang mereka dalam laga-laga selanjutnya.
Ia mengakui saat ini kondisi timnya tidak bagus, karena kehilangan pemain di posisi gelandang, yakni Rachmad, Toni Sucipto, dan Riko.
“Kita kehilangan tim dan terus berupaya membangun organisasi permainan. Saya akui ini tidak mudah dan saya terus mencoba agar tim meraih hasil terbaik,” katanya.
Selain itu, Persija bermain lamban di laga tersebut. Ia menyukai permainan yang cepat, namun hal itu tidak dapat dilakukan dengan jadwal yang seperti ini. “Kita bermain di setiap tiga hari, selepas laga ada waktu rehat satu hari dan kemudian bertanding kembali,” katanya.
Kondisi ini, menurut dia, menjadi persoalan serius yang harus dihadapi timnya dalam kompetisi ini dengan jadwal yang begitu padat tentu pemain harus menyesuaikan.
“Kita ingin pemain tampil baik, namun jadwal ini sangat berat sehingga mereka harus berhati-hati agar tidak cedera,” katanya.
Sementara itu, pemain Persija Jakarta Heri Susanto mensyukuri hasil imbang di kandang Semen Padang karena diraih dengan perjuangan yang berat. “Semoga ini menjadi batu loncatan bagi perjalanan tim ke depannya,” katanya.
Hasil ini membawa Persija Jakarta naik ke peringkat 13 dengan 28 poin dari 25 laga yang telah mereka jalani di kompetisi tertinggi di Indonesia.

League 1: Said Edson Tavares After Persija Detained by Semen Padang
Nov 7 2019, 13:25 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jakarta Persija coach Edson Tavares stated the points achieved when holding Semen Padang 2-2 in the League 1 continuation at Agus Salim Haji Stadium, Padang City, were very important for the team's journey.
"At the beginning of the round we played less well, but in the second half we developed for the better and the ball was well channeled," the Brazilian coach said after the match.
He said the result was positive for his team and important capital in welcoming the match which will be held at their home ground in subsequent matches.
He admitted that at this time the condition of his team was not good, because of the loss of players in midfield, namely Rachmad, Toni Sucipto, and Riko.
"We lost the team and continue to try to build a game organization. I admit this is not easy and I continue to try to make the team achieve the best results, "he said.
In addition, Persija played slowly in the game. He likes fast games, but that can't be done on a schedule like this. "We play every three days, after the game there is a one day break and then compete again," he said.
This condition, according to him, becomes a serious problem that must be faced by his team in this competition with such a tight schedule of players must adjust.
"We want the players to perform well, but this schedule is very heavy so they must be careful not to get injured," he said.
Meanwhile, Jakarta Persija player Heri Susanto was grateful for the draw at the Semen Padang home ground because it was achieved with an uphill battle. "Hopefully this will be a stepping stone for the team's journey going forward," he said.
These results brought Persija Jakarta up to 13th place with 28 points from 25 matches they have played in the highest competition in Indonesia.
